US spy chief "cannot rule out" that China would use TikTok to influence US electionsChina could use social media app TikTok to influence the 2024 U.S. elections, U.S. Director of National Intelligence Avril Haines told a House of Representatives intelligence committee hearing on Tuesday. Novo Nordisk-owner to expand in India this yearNovo Holdings, the controlling shareholder of Danish obesity drugmaker Novo Nordisk , plans to open an office in India this year to tap innovation and a growing healthcare market, its CEO Kasim Kutay said on Tuesday. Chess-Bored with standard chess? Go FreestyleFinding chess boring?
